title: Simplify Tag page stats and make the global header fully opaque

requirements.summary: Remove “Total Activity” and “Last Activity” fields from the Tag detail page stats block while preserving the rest of the page content and layout.
acceptanceCriteria: On /tag/:tag, the tag stats block no longer shows “Total Activity” or “Last Activity”.
No empty/placeholder layout gaps remain where those fields were previously rendered.
The tag page continues to load and render the tag name, lily count, sort tabs, and lily list as before.

file_operations.description: Remove rendering of the Tag Stats UI section that displays “Total Activity” and “Last Activity” (including labels/icons/values), and clean up any now-unused imports/hooks (e.g., date formatting and icons) so the page continues to render tag name, lily count, sort tabs, and lily list without layout gaps.

requirements.summary: Make the global header fully opaque by removing translucent background and backdrop-blur styling while keeping sticky behavior and controls intact.
acceptanceCriteria: The header background is fully opaque in both light and dark mode (no alpha background classes like bg-*/xx).
The header no longer uses backdrop blur styling to create translucent effects.
Header remains sticky and continues to render navigation/search controls correctly across pages.

file_operations.description: Update the header container classes to remove translucent background styling (e.g., bg-*/xx) and remove backdrop-blur/supports-[backdrop-filter] translucency, replacing with an opaque background class so the header remains sticky and functions/controls remain unchanged.
